SELECT B.SCHEDULE_ID, B.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i') SCHEDULE_START, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R WHERE B.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.TUTORING_YN = 'N' AND R.STATUS = '02') RESERVATION_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R WHERE B.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.TUTORING_YN = 'Y' AND R.STATUS = '02') TUTORING_RESERVATION_COUNT, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(S.STORE_NAME, ' ', - 1) FROM STORE S WHERE S.STORE_ID = B.STORE_ID) STORE_NAME_SHORT, (SELECT NAME FROM PLAY PL WHERE B.PLAY_ID = PL.PLAY_ID) PLAY_NAME, B.SUB_TOPIC FROM RESERVATION A, SCHEDULE B WHERE A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID
AND B.STORE_ID = #{storeId}
AND A.TUTORING_YN = 'N'
AND A.TUTORING_YN = 'Y'
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d%H') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 HOUR),'%Y%m%d%H')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d%H') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d%H') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL + 1 HOUR),'%Y%m%d%H')
GROUP BY A.SCHEDULE_ID ORDER BY B.SCHEDULE_ID, B.SCHEDULE_START

SELECT A.RESERVATION_ID, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.CELL_PHONE) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,4,4),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,8,4)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,4,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,7,4)) END AS CELL_PHONE, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(S.STORE_NAME, ' ', - 1) FROM STORE S WHERE S.STORE_ID = B.STORE_ID) STORE_NAME_SHORT, A.VOUCHER_NO, A.SCHEDULE_ID, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i'),'~',DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_END,'%H:%i')) SCHEDULE_TIME, B.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, B.TUTORING_NUMBER, A.STATUS, A.REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, A.UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') UPD_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R WHERE B.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.TUTORING_YN = 'N' AND R.STATUS = '02') RESERVATION_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R WHERE B.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.TUTORING_YN = 'Y' AND R.STATUS = '02') TUTORING_RESERVATION_COUNT, DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i') SCHEDULE_START, CASE WHEN IFNULL((SELECT ENG_NAME FROM MEMBER_CHILDREN MC WHERE MC.PARENT_CELL_PHONE = A.CELL_PHONE AND A.CHILD_NAME = MC.NAME), '0') != '0' THEN (SELECT ENG_NAME FROM MEMBER_CHILDREN MC WHERE MC.PARENT_CELL_PHONE = A.CELL_PHONE AND A.CHILD_NAME = MC.NAME) ELSE A.CHILD_NAME END AS CHILD_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM PLAY PL WHERE B.PLAY_ID = PL.PLAY_ID) PLAY_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER_PARENT P WHERE A.CELL_PHONE = P.CELL_PHONE AND P.STATUS = 'A') NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE_ENTRANCE_MEMBER SEM, MEMBER_PARENT P WHERE SEM.RESERVATION_ID = A.RESERVATION_ID AND P.QR_CODE = SEM.MEMBER_QR_CODE AND P.STATUS = 'A') ENTRANCE_COUNT, CASE WHEN (SELECT V.TICKET_NAME FROM VOUCHER V WHERE V.VOUCHER_NO = A.VOUCHER_NO) = '1회권' THEN '후불' ELSE '' END AS ADD_TEXT, B.SUB_TOPIC FROM RESERVATION A, SCHEDULE B WHERE A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID
AND B.STORE_ID = #{storeId}
AND A.TUTORING_YN = 'N'
AND A.TUTORING_YN = 'Y'
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d%H') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 HOUR),'%Y%m%d%H')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d%H') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H')
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y%m%d%H') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL + 1 HOUR),'%Y%m%d%H')
GROUP BY A.RESERVATION_ID ORDER BY B.SCHEDULE_ID, B.SCHEDULE_START

SELECT A.RESERVATION_ID, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.CELL_PHONE) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,4,4),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,8,4)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,1,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,4,3),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CELL_PHONE,7,4)) END AS CELL_PHONE, A.VOUCHER_NO, A.SCHEDULE_ID, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i'),'~',DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_END,'%H:%i')) SCHEDULE_TIME, B.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, B.TUTORING_NUMBER, A.STATUS, A.REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, A.UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') UPD_DATE, COUNT(*) RESERVATION_CNT, FORMAT(((COUNT(*) / B.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE) * 100), 0) AS RESERVATION_PER, DATE_FORMAT(B.SCHEDULE_START,'%H%i') SCHEDULE_START, D.NAME CHILD_NAME, D.BIRTHDAY CHILD_BIRTHDAY, E.NAME PLAY_NAME, C.QR_CODE MEMBER_QR_CODE, E.PLAY_TIME, E.VOUCHER_TIME, D.SEX CHILD_SEX FROM RESERVATION A, SCHEDULE B, MEMBER_PARENT C, MEMBER_CHILDREN D, PLAY E WHERE A.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId} AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID AND A.CELL_PHONE = C.CELL_PHONE AND C.CELL_PHONE = D.PARENT_CELL_PHONE AND C.STATUS = 'A' AND B.PLAY_ID = E.PLAY_ID

SELECT SUB.SCHEDULE_ID, SUB.CNT RESERVATION_COUNT, (SUB.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE - SUB.CNT) REMAIN_COUNT, SUB.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, SUB.SCHEDULE_START, SUB.NAME PLAY_NAME, SUB.PLAY_TIME, SUB.VOUCHER_TIME FROM ( SELECT B.SCHEDULE_ID, COUNT(A.RESERVATION_ID) CNT, B.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, B.SCHEDULE_START, C.NAME, C.PLAY_TIME, C.VOUCHER_TIME FROM RESERVATION A, (SELECT * FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_START BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), '0000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')) B, PLAY C WHERE A.STATUS = '02' AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID AND B.PLAY_ID = C.PLAY_ID GROUP BY B.SCHEDULE_ID, B.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, B.SCHEDULE_START, C.NAME, C.PLAY_TIME ORDER BY ABS(DATEDIFF(NOW(), SCHEDULE_START)) ASC LIMIT 1 ) SUB

SELECT A.VOUCHER_NO, FORMAT(A.PRICE, 0) PRICE, A.TICKET_NAME FROM VOUCHER A, VOUCHER_ATTRIBUTE B WHERE A.STATUS = '02'
AND A.END_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
AND A.VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO AND B.ATTRIBUTE = '비회원'
AND A.STORE_ID = #{storeId}

SELECT SEM_ID, CHILD_NAME, CELL_PHONE, CHILD_BIRTHDAY, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y%m%d'),ENTRANCE_TIME), '%Y%m%d%H'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ENTRANCE_TIME, PRICE, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(S.STORE_NAME, ' ', - 1) FROM STORE S WHERE S.STORE_ID = SCHEDULE_ENTRANCE_MEMBER.STORE_ID) STORE_NAME_SHORT, SCHEDULE_TYPE, (SELECT SI.NAME FROM STAFF_INFO SI WHERE SI.STAFF_ID = SCHEDULE_ENTRANCE_MEMBER.REG_ID) STAFF_NAME, REG_ID, REG_DATE, UPD_ID, UPD_DATE FROM SCHEDULE_ENTRANCE_MEMBER

D.PLAY_TIME, A.TIME_LEFT_MINUTE FROM VOUCHER_USE_VIEW A, RESERVATION B, SCHEDULE C, PLAY D WHERE B.RESERVATION_ID = #{reservationId} AND A.VOUCHER_NO = B.VOUCHER_NO AND B.SCHEDULE_ID = C.SCHEDULE_ID AND C.PLAY_ID = D.PLAY_ID
